mapper.update: update product set building_id = #{building_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accom_id = #{accom_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bed_id = #{bed_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sguest_id = #{sguest_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_step = 9 where product_seq = #{product_seq,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.product_seq , p.product_name , p.product_price , a.ACCOM_NAME , p.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE , p.P_MAIN_IMG , p.product_lng , p.product_lat , ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians(#{lat,jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ) * cos( radians(product_lat) ) * cos( radians( product_lng ) - radians(#{lng,jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ) + sin( radians(#{lat,jdbcType=NUMERIC})) * sin( radians( product_lat ) ) ) ) AS distance FROM PRODUCT P, ACCOM_CODE a WHERE a.ACCOM_ID=p.ACCOM_ID AND number_of_people >= #{number_of_people, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) x WHERE distance <= 30 ORDER BY distance

SELECT P. PRODUCT_SEQ , P.P_MAIN_IMG , P.MEMBER_ID , P.PRODUCT_NAME , P.PRODUCT_PRICE , P.COUNTRY_ID , P.PRODUCT_ADDR , P.PRODUCT_ADDR_DETAIL , P.ACCOM_ID , P.BED_ID , P.BUILDING_ID , P.SGUEST_ID , P.PRODUCT_INFO , P.PRODUCT_SIMPLE_INFO , P.PRODUCT_LAT , P.PRODUCT_LNG , P.PRODUCT_SCORE , P.PRODUCT_MINDT , P.PRODUCT_MAXDT , P.PRODUCT_READYDT , P.PRODUCT_PREPDT , P.PRODUCT_STEP , P.PRODUCT_REGDT , P.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE , P.CHECKIN_TIME , P.CHECKOUT_TIME , A.ACCOM_NAME , B.BED_NAME , C.BUILDING_NAME , D.SGUEST_NAME FROM PRODUCT P, ACCOM_CODE A, BED_CODE B, BUILDING_CODE C, SUIT_GUEST_CODE D WHERE product_seq = #{product_seq} AND P.ACCOM_ID = A.ACCOM_ID (+) AND P.BED_ID = B.BED_ID (+) AND P.BUILDING_ID = C.BUILDING_ID (+) AND P.SGUEST_ID = D.SGUEST_ID (+)
SELECT A.SAFETY_NAME FROM PRODUCT P, PRODUCT_SAFETY S, SAFETY_CODE A WHERE P.PRODUCT_SEQ = S.PRODUCT_SEQ AND S.SAFETY_ID = A.SAFETY_ID AND S.PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_seq}
SELECT A.CONVIN_NAME FROM PRODUCT P, PRODUCT_CONVIN C, CONVIN_CODE A WHERE P.PRODUCT_SEQ = C.PRODUCT_SEQ AND C.CONVIN_ID = A.CONVIN_ID AND C.PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_seq}
SELECT A.SPACE_NAME FROM PRODUCT P, PRODUCT_SPACE C, SPACE_CODE A WHERE P.PRODUCT_SEQ = C.PRODUCT_SEQ AND C.SPACE_ID = A.SPACE_ID AND C.PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_seq}
SELECT A.REGULATION_NAME FROM PRODUCT P, PRODUCT_REGUL C, REGULATION_CODE A WHERE P.PRODUCT_SEQ = C.PRODUCT_SEQ AND C.REGULATION_ID = A.REGULATION_ID AND C.PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_seq}
SELECT M.MEMBER_FIRST_NAME, M.MEMBER_LAST_NAME, M.MEMBER_IMG, M.MEMBER_REG_DATE, M.MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER M, PRODUCT P WHERE P.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID AND P.PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_REPLY (PRODUCT_SEQ, MEMBER_ID, PREPLY_CONTENT, MEMBER_SCORE) VALUES (#{product_seq,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{member_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preply_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{member_score,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
